description: Works to lime trees covered by ENFIELD ORDER NO. 2 (1957)- 5x limes (Item 1):repollard by removing 2m in most cases up to 5m and 7 limes (item 2): crown lift to create 2m clearance from ground level to the lowest remaining foliage, and the 2x northerly most trees prune back westward lateral growth to provide 2m clearance from the Bartlett arboricultural building.
